keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and I can secure better deals for the UK.
By getting the right deal from Brexit, we can deliver a stronger economy and brighter future.
Stewart has worked to make the NHS and healthcare a top priority. Peterborough City Hospital has been a focus area since his election in 2005.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. The Great Repeal Bill to ensure a smooth and orderly Brexit.
issues.economy: Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe, in economic growth and national security. Build a stronger economy that rewards people for hard work.
issues.health: Support for the NHS and healthcare as a top priority. Focus on Peterborough City Hospital and mental health services for children and young people.

community.content: Stewart has a strong track record of speaking up for local people and local services, batting plans for the Energy Park near Newborough, petitioning Downing Street on the Great Northern Rail franchise and fighting for road improvements.
Peterborough's economy is on the up. It has one of the best rates of jobs growth in the UK. Since 2010, adult unemployment has halved and youth unemployment is down by 75% in the same period.

politicalExperience.achievements: Made NHS and healthcare a top priority. Focused on Peterborough City Hospital and mental health services for children and young people. Strong track record of speaking up for local people and services.

contactInformation.address: Peterborough Conservatives, 193 Dogsthorpe Road, Peterborough, PE1 3AT

endorsements.endorsement: With your help and your vote for my local candidate, together we can get Brexit right and secure our economic future.

images.caption: Stewart Jackson: 12 years of campaigning for our area
Peterborough's economy is on the up

examples: Peterborough’s economy is on the up. It has one of the best rates of jobs growth in the UK. Since 2010, adult unemployment has halved and youth unemployment is down by 75% in the same period.
Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON’T BE SO SURE
With a strong negotiating hand I can deliver for you and for Britain.
Stewart has a strong track record of speaking up for local people and local services, batting plans for the Energy Park near Newborough.
Petitioning Downing Street on the Great Northern Rail franchise and fighting for road improvements.
Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
